remarks.format:
## Remarks The object that is returned by this method is initially positioned before the first element in this collection. You must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method before you can access the first element. To access the element at the current position, call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> property.
Do not modify the collection while using the enumerator. If the collection is modified while an enumerator is in use, an attempt to set the position by calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> causes an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
